summary: REQ-9 (futuristic/digital theme) appears largely implemented via updated CSS theme tokens and extensive className styling updates across layout and pages. REQ-10 (restyled static branding image assets) is not evidenced in the diff summary; image paths are preserved and still referenced, but no asset file updates are shown. Some non-requested functional changes (copy-to-clipboard principal UI and a timestamp type fix) are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the existing static branding assets so they visually match the uploaded Infinity Coin logo style (image.png), keeping filenames/paths compatible with the current UI usage.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows continued usage of the existing image paths in WalletLogo and Dashboard, but does not show any modified/added static image asset files for the referenced PNGs; only TSX/CSS/config files are modified in the provided summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added copy-to-clipboard interaction and copied-state UI for displaying the authenticated principal.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is scoped to visual/theme updates and explicitly lists non-goals around adding new wallet features beyond visual/theme updates; adding clipboard copy behavior is a new functional capability not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Fixed a timestamp type error in History page by changing how formatTimestamp is called (per diff summary note).
hallucinated_features.reason: This is a functional/bugfix change not described in REQ-9/REQ-10, which focus on theme and branding assets.
